data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Västernorrland.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Västernorrland, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Västernorrland to agree with you and with one another.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 17 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Västernorrland, Sweden.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Västernorrland.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, Libyan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, help your children in Västernorrland, Sweden find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 242,000 people living in Västernorrland, Sweden. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Västernorrland, Sweden.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.
